description:
Taking a break from their latest triumph over Faust and the Spiral Core, Ginga and his friends find themselves saving a boy named Yuuki from a mysterious boy named Johannes. Although Yuuki is a boy genius and an astronomer, he is a Blader who owns Anubius. Yuuki says that he has come to tell Ginga and his friends about the voice of the Star Fragment, and that it must not fall into the hands of evil. He witnessed the Star Fragment fall from the sky one day. That single light dwells within Anubius and he says that he heard the voice of the Star Fragment that evening. A great evil is trying to revive the Black Sun and the Nemesis, the Greek goddess of Revenge, by using the unknown power of the Star Fragment, and destroy the world. They must find the ten legendary bladers (The four seasons is Ginga, Kyouya, Ryuga, (Kenta) and Chris. The five solor sestem bey legendary bladerers Yuuki, King, Aguma, Tiphi, and Dynamies. the one who has Nemesis is Rago.) in order to prevent Nemesis from reviving. In the end, Ginga defeats the God of Destruction with a new special move, Super Cosmic Nova.
Source: Wikipedia

REGULAR.description:
When a star falls from the sky, a young blader named Yuki is waiting for it. He immediately sets out to find Gingka, but this proves difficult as Gingka has been lured into a battle on an island against his old rival Kyoya.
Source: crunchyroll

Yuki battles with a dark character named Johannes, but Gingka arrives and sends Johannes packing.  Yuki tells the gang the story of a recently fallen star that has chosen certain bladers to be known as Legendary Bladers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: レジェンドブレーダー

REGULAR.description:
Gingka and his friends are about to start their quest to find the 8 Legendary Bladers, but they run into Johannes and a battle ensues.  Things look bad for Gingka until Kyoya arrives and joins the battle, driving Johannes off.
Source: crunchyroll

While Gingka and the gang try to make friends, Benkei and Kyoya meet Ryuga at the top of a volcano and Kyoya challenges Ryuga to a bey battle.  Ryuga tells Kyoya that he should not be battling, that he doesn’t even know his bey yet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: エルドラゴデストロイ

REGULAR.description:
After Ryuga defeats Kyoya, Gingka challenges him to a bey battle, but Ryuga quickly defeats him too.  Yuki challenges him to yet another battle but his bey, Mercury Anubius, is battered again and again by Ryuga’s L-Drago Destructor.
Source: crunchyroll

When a volcano erupts, Gingka, Yuki and Kyoya change the course of the lava by using their beys and save the village. They leave the island but are shocked when Kenta announces that he is heading out on his own.
Source: crunchyroll

Kenta travels to a remote desert town where he competes against Ryuga in a tournament but loses. He then follows Ryuga on a difficult cross country trek, trying to convince Ryuga that he should lend his strength as a Legendary Blader to Gingka and the others.
Source: crunchyroll

Johannes breaks into Beylin Temple and is confronted by Gingka and his friends.  Dashan engages the intruder in a bey battle but Johannes quits, claiming that Dashan is not a Legendary Blader and not worth his time.
Source: crunchyroll

At the Tag Team Championship a series of battles occur in which Dashan and Chiyun are victorious as are Johannes and his new partner, Motty.  When Yuki and Gingka challenge Mei-Mei and Chaoxin, Yuki suffers a serious lack of confidence and almost gives up.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 最強タッグ戦, 登竜門

REGULAR.description:
The Tag Team Tournament continues and the final four teams are determined.  The team of Dashan and Chiyun win their match quickly, but Kyoya and Benkei have a long battle with Motty and Johannes.  In the end Kyoya defeats Johannes to move on.
Source: crunchyroll

In the second Round of the Tag Team tournament, Gingka and Yuki face Dashan and Chiyun in a mountain top stadium.  Gingka and Yuki win when Gingka creates a new special move, Cosmic Tornado. Next up, it’s Beylin Fist against Kyoya and Benkei.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ビッグバントルネード

REGULAR.description:
Ginka and Yuki travel to an ancient Bey Temple to battle Bao and Aguma of Beylin Fist in the final of the Toryumon Tag Team Tournament.  The Beylin Fist team starts strong and soon has Gingka and Yuki in a tough spot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 土星神(どせいしん)クロノス

REGULAR.description:
After winning the Tag Team Tournament, Bao and Aguma disappear in a helicopter.  They are followed by Johannes into the wilderness where he says he has news about the star fragment in Aguma’s Bey.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Showdown at the Tower of Babel!

REGULAR.description:
Aguma and Bao follow Johannes to meet Pluto, who wants Beylin Fist to join him in his dark quest for power. Gingka and his friends travel to Greece where they meet Sophie, Wales, Julian and Klaus.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 新生! チーム・ダンジョン

REGULAR.description:
Masamune and his friends witness an argument amongst the Garcias before their match in the Destroyer Dome and it appears that the family is breaking apart.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スフィア360(スリーシックスゼロ)

REGULAR.description:
Masamune and his new bey, Blitz Striker, battle against some old foes and new ones in the Destroyer Dome.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 完成! 新ユニコルノ

REGULAR.description:
In the final of a battle royal in the Destroyer Dome, six bladers battle to see who will come out on top.  The bladers, King, Jigsaw, Zeo, Toby, tsubasa and Masamune give it their all.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: オレさまこそがチャンピオン!

REGULAR.description:
Gingka and his friends travel to Africa in search of a Legendary Blader that they believe lives in a mysterious place called Mist Mountain. With their guides Nile and Damoure they climb the mountain and come to a maze that was built by an ancient people.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ミストマウンテンの迷宮

REGULAR.description:
Ryuto leads Gingka and his friends into a temple on Mist Mountain in search of a Star Fragment.  They are unaware that they are being followed by Johannes and the bladers from Beylin Fist, who are also seeking the Fragment.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka and the others reach a temple where they believe a star fragment lies but they cannot open a door that blocks their entrance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Guardian of the Temple, Dynamis
神殿の守護者デュナミス

REGULAR.description:
Gingka battles Dynamis the Guardian of the temple.  Gingka seems to have chosen the wrong strategy, but admits that he was too caught up in being a legendary Blader and says that he should have been paying more attention.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ネメシス, 復活の伝説

REGULAR.description:
Dynamis tries to explain to Johannes and his followers that no matter what they do, the heavens will decide what will happen with the resurrection of Hades and Nemesis, not them. A battle ensues and every blader from each side joins in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 四季の戦士(ブレーダー)

REGULAR.description:
Gingka and his friends arrive at Beyster Island where they have entered a tournament that has attracted a huge number of strong Bladers.
Source: crunchyroll

As the battle of Beyster Island continues, many more bladers are knocked out of the competition.  Gingka catches up with Kenta only to find that he is his next opponent in the tournament.
Source: crunchyroll

The Beyster Island Tournament continues as an unseen Blader defeats contestant after contestant through a series of ambushes. When the Blader defeats Zeo and Toby, Masamune swears he will avenge them in the final.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 姿なき対戦者(ブレーダー)

REGULAR.description:
Gingka asks Chris, the newest Legendary Blader, to join him in his fight against evil, but Chris says he will join whoever pays him the most.  King is enraged by this and Chris’ mocking of Masamune so King challenges him to a battle.
Source: crunchyroll

Kyoya is ambushed by a group of bladers in the mountains but he defeats them all. They apologize, claiming they thought he was a monster that has been terrorizing their village.
Source: crunchyroll

Kyoya is ambushed by a group of bladers in the mountains but he defeats them all. They apologize, claiming they thought he was a monster that has been terrorizing their village.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 怪物(モンスター)の正体

REGULAR.description:
Tithi and Yu agree to a bey battle in the ruins and Tithi proves to be a strong opponent and he defeats Yu.  Kyoya is sure that Tithi is a Legendary Blader and so challenges him to a battle next.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 金星神ケツァルコアトル

REGULAR.description:
In Pluto’s lair in Mexico, the powers of the beys of some of the Legendary Bladers are used to begin the revival of Nemesis.
Source: crunchyroll

In Pluto’s lair in Mexico, the powers of the beys of some of the Legendary Bladers are used to begin the revival of Nemesis.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka and his friends have landed in Mexico and rush to try and stop Nemesis’ Revival.   Inside the temple, Rago, the Child of the Black Son, has already arrived.  Gingka, King, Yuki, Masaune and Madoka make it inside the temple and battles begin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 黒き太陽(ネメシス)の申し子

REGULAR.description:
Gingka and his friends have landed in Mexico and rush to try and stop Nemesis’ Revival.   Inside the temple, Rago, the Child of the Black Son, has already arrived.  Gingka, King, Yuki, Masaune and Madoka make it inside the temple and battles begin.
Source: crunchyroll

The battle to stop the revival of Nemesis continues as Kyoya battles Dynamis and Tithi takes on Aguma in a temple in Mexico.  Meanwhile, Gingka, Yuki and Madoka take off to follow a hunch that Gingka has.
Source: crunchyroll

The battle to stop the revival of Nemesis continues as Kyoya battles Dynamis and Tithi takes on Aguma in a temple in Mexico.  Meanwhile, Gingka, Yuki and Madoka take off to follow a hunch that Gingka has.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka defeats Chris in battle but convinces Chris that as a Legendary Blader, Chris is part of a team and not alone anymore.  Aguma is defeated by Tithi and Dynamis gets Aguma to go with him and follow Gingka and the others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 集結! レジェンドブレーダー

REGULAR.description:
Gingka defeats Chris in battle but convinces Chris that as a Legendary Blader, Chris is part of a team and not alone anymore.  Aguma is defeated by Tithi and Dynamis gets Aguma to go with him and follow Gingka and the others.
Source: crunchyroll

In a temple in Mexico, Rago  battles all comers including Gingka and his friends and Ryuga and none of their beys have any effect on Rago’s Diablo Nemesis as it sends them all flying Pegasus.
Source: crunchyroll

In a temple in Mexico, Rago  battles all comers including Gingka and his friends and Ryuga and none of their beys have any effect on Rago’s Diablo Nemesis as it sends them all flying Pegasus.
Source: crunchyroll

While the WBBA and all its members are searching the world for signs of Rago and Nemesis, Gingka and his friends are training hard for the battle they know is ahead of them.
Source: crunchyroll

While the WBBA and all its members are searching the world for signs of Rago and Nemesis, Gingka and his friends are training hard for the battle they know is ahead of them.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka and his friends fly towards the location of Nemesis in the Pacific Ocean, but the helicopter they are travelling in hits a vicious storm.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka and his friends fly towards the location of Nemesis in the Pacific Ocean, but the helicopter they are travelling in hits a vicious storm.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 破壊神(ネメシス)VS竜皇(エルドラゴ)

REGULAR.description:
Gingka and his friends try to help Ryuga who has been badly hurt in a battle with Rago, but it appears they are too late to save him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Missing Star of the Four Seasons

REGULAR.description:
Gingka and his friends try to help Ryuga who has been badly hurt in a battle with Rago, but it appears they are too late to save him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Missing Star of the Four Seasons

REGULAR.description:
Kenta and his newly evolved bey, Flash Sagittario, battle head to head with Rago and his bey, Diablo Nemesis.  Gingka is convinced that Kenta has been given the powers of the summer constellation legendary Blader from Ryuga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: フラッシュサジタリオ

REGULAR.description:
Kenta and his newly evolved bey, Flash Sagittario, battle head to head with Rago and his bey, Diablo Nemesis.  Gingka is convinced that Kenta has been given the powers of the summer constellation legendary Blader from Ryuga.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka and the rest of the Four Season Legendary Bladers appear to complete Zeus’ Barrier and seal Nemesis away for good, along with Rago and Pluto who are carried down with the destruction of the Lost Kingdom of Hades.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka and the rest of the Four Season Legendary Bladers appear to complete Zeus’ Barrier and seal Nemesis away for good, along with Rago and Pluto who are carried down with the destruction of the Lost Kingdom of Hades.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka has received the power of all his friends’ beys and he and Pegasus are in a head to head battle with Nemesis.  Gingka fights hard but soon realizes that Pegasus’ power is exactly equal to the power of Nemesis.
Source: crunchyroll

Gingka has received the power of all his friends’ beys and he and Pegasus are in a head to head battle with Nemesis.  Gingka fights hard but soon realizes that Pegasus’ power is exactly equal to the power of Nemesis.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: メタルファイト ベイブレード 4D
メタルファイト ベイブレード4D
